explanation: The original code only checked for a full row of blacks ("##") or the two diagonal patterns, but it missed the cases where both rows are identical ("#."/"#." or ".#"/".#"), which give a vertical connection and should be "Yes". I fixed the single conditional line by adding or S1 == S2 so identical rows are treated as connected. (This is similar in spirit to fixes that add the missing condition in an OR expression, as in the diff that corrected a missing variable on the right-hand side of an or.)
